verbose_text: In a subsequent series of experiments, glucose metabolism in C. elegans was inhibited by knockdown of the insulin receptor, insulin like growth factor 1 (IGF-1) receptor, and insulin receptor substrate 1 (IRS-1) [XREF_BIBR].
